channel.title: Cant log in to my no-ip server
channel.description: for some reason i can only log into my server when i use hamachi. i have the no-ip duc open and my server is registered and i got compiler open and i cant log in. any suggestions?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 09, 2006, 05:52:50 PM[/size][hr]any1 plz?

item.title: Cant log in to my no-ip server
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Step One
Go to My Computer > Control Panel > Network Connections.

Step Two
Click on Local Area Connections.
Step Three
Go to the Support tab of the window and it will show an ip. Take THE FIRST IP YOU SEE (going down).
Step Four
Go to your router configuration (can’t explain as you need to follow someone else’s guide on this) and check if the ip you used when you port forwarded before as it just was a few moments ago. If it isn’t, then change it to the ip address you just got from the Local Area Connection

It should work fine now. Smiley Post any problems you have.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant log in to my no-ip server
